Talent.Name: Elemental Resonance: High Voltage
Talent.Desc: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 $[K310]. (Active Character prioritized)\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
